Package org.xml.sax.ext

Provides extension classes and interfaces for the Simple API for XML (SAX) which is a component of the Java API for XML Processing.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DeclHandler SAX2 extension handler for DTD declaration events.
LexicalHandler SAX2 extension handler for lexical events.
 

Package org.xml.sax.ext Description

Provides extension classes and interfaces for the Simple API for XML (SAX) which is a component of the Java API for XML Processing. SAX, the Simple API for XML, is a standard interface for event-based XML parsing, developed collaboratively by the members of the XML-DEV mailing list, currently hosted by OASIS. See the following link for more information on SAX.

Since:
JDK1.4
